examples.example: 我的爷爷总是笑容满面，非常和蔼可亲。

translate.english: My grandfather always has a big smile on his face and is very amiable.

examples.example: 我的爷爷有着一颗积极乐观的心，对生活充满了热爱。

translate.english: My grandfather has a positive and optimistic heart and is full of love for life.

examples.example: 我的爷爷虽年事已高，但精神矍铄，每天都乐呵呵的。

translate.english: My grandfather is advanced in years but hale and hearty, and he is happy every day.
